quotes: No components are there just a warning

requirements.text: Verify the backend getIndexedTransactions method exists and returns transaction data in the correct format expected by the frontend TransactionList component
acceptanceCriteria: Backend main.mo contains a query method named getIndexedTransactions
Method returns transaction data from stable memory storage

Method returns transactions in reverse chronological order (newest first)

requirements.text: Verify the backend getHolderData method exists and returns complete holder list data in the correct format expected by the frontend HolderList component
acceptanceCriteria: Backend main.mo contains a query method named getHolderData or similar
Method returns holder data from stable memory storage
Return format includes address, balance, and percentage of total supply for each holder
Method properly handles cases when holder data hasn't been compiled yet
Method returns all holders identified through the historical backfill and ongoing indexing

constraints: Do not modify the backend's single-actor architecture

Do not edit immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Maintain the existing backend indexing timer and historical backfill logic
Keep the gold theme and visual styling consistent with existing components
nonGoals: Changing the positioning of components (keep TransactionList and HolderList in their current intended positions per App.tsx)
Modifying the indexing logic or polling intervals
Altering the data structures stored in backend stable memory
Changing pagination settings (keep 25 transactions per page)
